"How can I ;convert WMV to MP3; that I can listen to on iPod, Sansa MP3 player and other portable media players?"
;
;As we know that WMV file only works on Windows Media Players, it can't go with most MP3 players. However, MP3 instead, works well on iTunes, WMP and goes on any music player device including iPods. Otherwise, MP3 has the smaller size and still good quality.
;
;So, How to ;convert WMV to MP3;, let's go to this quick solution:
;

;;Step 2.; Choose MP3 as output format

;
;;Step 3.p; Start conversion
